reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Addressing the challenge of achieving the UNAIDS (90-90-90) strategy to end the AIDS epidemic by 2030 and reducing tuberculosis mortality by 75% and incidence by 50% by 2025 in the Union of the Comoros

description.narrative: Comoros - TB/HIV - Ministry of Health, Solidarity, Social Protection and Gender Promotion of the Union of the Comoros - DNLS. This program has the following goals: TB: Réduire de 50% du taux de l’incidence (par rapport à 2018) d'ici 2025/ TB: Reduce incidence rate by 50% (compared to 2018) by 2025. TB: Réduire de 45% le nombre de décès dus à la TB (par rapport à 2018) d'ici 2025 / TB: Reduce the number of TB deaths by 45% (compared to 2018) by 2025. HIV: Réduire de 75 % des nouveaux cas d’infection, y compris parmi les populations clés (par rapport à 2020) d'ici 2025/ HIV: Reduce by 75% of new infections, including among key populations (compared to 2020) by 2025. HIV: Faire en sorte que 95 % des personnes vivant avec le VIH connaissent leur statut sérologique, que 95 % des personnes infectées par le VIH diagnostiquées reçoivent un traitement antirétroviral et que 95 % des personnes vivant avec le VIH recevant un traitement antirétroviral aient une charge virale supprimee d'ici 2024 / HIV: Ensure that 95% of people living with HIV know their HIV status, that 95% of people diagnosed with HIV receive antiretroviral therapy, and that 95% of people living with HIV receiving antiretroviral therapy have a supressed viral load by 2024. The objectives of this program are: TB: Augmenter le dépistage des nouveaux cas et rechutes en passant de 41% en 2020 à 89% en 2025/ TB: Increase screening for new cases and relapses from 41% in 2020 to 89% in 2025. TB: Traiter 100% des patients diagnostiqués et maintenir un taux de succès de traitement à au moins 90% jusqu’en 2025/ TB: Treat 100% of diagnosed patients and maintain at least 90% treatment success rate until 2025. TB: Dépister et prendre en charge 100% des patients TB/VIH et TB-MR d'ici 2025/ TB: Screen and manage 100% of TB / HIV and MDR-TB patients by 2025. TB/VIH: Assurer la prévention tuberculeuse à au moins 95% des enfants contacts et PVVIH d’ici 2025/ TB / HIV: Provide TB prevention to at least 95% of child contacts and PLHIV by 2025. TB/VIH: Améliorer la gestion, le suivi et l'évaluation des programmes et renforcer les systèmes de santé, résilients et pérennes pour répondre efficacement à l'épidémie du VIH et de la TB/ TB / HIV: Improve program management, monitoring and evaluation and strengthen resilient and sustainable health systems to respond effectively to the HIV and TB epidemic. VIH: Améliorer la qualité des services offerts aux PVVIH grâce à une approche centrée sur le patient et à des soins différenciés aux niveaux des centres de santé et de la communauté./ HIV: Improve the quality of services offered to PLWHIV through a patient-centered approach and differentiated care at health center and community levels.. VIH: Atteindre les cibles 95-95-95 d'ici 2024/ HIV: Reaching the 95-95-95 targets in to 2024

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Percentage of people living with HIV newly initiated on ART who were screened for TB
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of TB patients with DST result for at least Rifampicin among the total number of notified (new and retreatment) cases in the same year
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
